title: Endothermic
text:
I heard it’s supposed to make you feel better
take a little weight off your ears
just like a few more beers
equals a few less fears
I heard thats the case with you

I’ll do anything you ask of him
I’ll do anything you ask of him
I’ll do anything you ask of him
I’ll do anything you ask of him

I heard it’s supposed to make you feel older
drop a little weight in your arms
just like you’re supposed to bear arms
before not after you leave
I heard thats the case with you

I’ll do anything you ask of him
I’ll do anything you ask of him
I’ll do anything you ask of him
I’ll do anything you ask of him!
